Articles.Content:
How will Rask and Rusk work? I haven't seen these questions on the forums, so I decided to ask them.

Will we be able to land on Rask, then fly up to Rusk vertically? How will lava work? Will there be tech that can float on lava? Any other things?
No one knows. You'll see when the game comes out.

On 1/28/2022 at 6:59 AM, BekfastDerp13 said:

Will we be able to land on Rask, then fly up to Rusk vertically?

We don't know the details, but I can still definitely tell you that simply flying straight up from one and towards the other won't work.

Depending on how exactly Intercept implements SoIs for the Risk System, the transfers will differ, but even under the simplest implementation of barycenter SoI + two planetary SoIs, the transfer will already be fairly complicated. If Intercept implements some sort of limited n-body simulation for these, then you might have some really interesting transfer options.

P.S. Whatever it will be, Rask and Rusk will put your navigation and piloting skills to the test, that's for sure.

Edited January 30, 2022 by K^2
